nodes.text: Hibernation chambers were items used by the Chiss in 18 BBY and the Grysk in 2 BBY.

Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo used one to remand The Magys after she ordered the suicide of her companion and before she could commit suicide herself in the aftermath of the first skirmish over Sunrise. Caregiver Mitth'ali'astov likened their appearances to coffins.
The Grysk species used them to transport the Chiss Force-sensitive girls they captured. The Galactic Empire was able to recover the chambers during the battle of Mokivj.
Hibernation chambers first appeared in the 2018 novel Thrawn: Alliances.
